articles.title: "Go Home Indian" - Sikh Restaurateur Targeted In Australia: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A Sikh restaurateur living in Australia has alleged that he has been racially targeted several times in recent months, telling him to "go home" and smearing his car with dog excrement.
articles.content:
Tasmania Police said the incidents were being investigated. (Representational)
